REST API repository Contacts¶

Create new contact for specified user

  • body (ContactModel) – The data for the new contact to create

  • db (Session) – The database session

Returns:

Return type:

Contact

  • contact_id (int) – ID of contact

  • field_name (str) – Field to search contact by

  • field_value (str) – Value of wanted field

  • background_tasks (BackgroundTasks) – Background tasks handler

  • body – The data fot the new user to create

class src.services.auth.Auth¶

Bases: object

Class that define the entire authorization process
